Report.Name: Run History Data for PN - SN

Details.Remark: Begin:Oct 16 2015 11:00AM-End:Oct 30 2015 11:58AM Remark:Durante el armado de BHA hubo problemas de comunicación con el ATK. Del troubleshooting se encontro el stab modular en cortocircuito. Se reemplazo y continuo armando. La prueba con flujo se hizo a 300m porque en superficie se desbordo la presa. Se isntalo cabeza rotatoria. En 2 ocasiones hubo paro de operaciones debido a fugas en el Standpipe. Por mal tiempo tambien hubo paro de operaciones en varias ocasiones. El dia 17 opct a las 20:30 paro perforacion @ 3139 m por perdida. Envio comando ribsoff y saco a la zapata. Los dias 18 y 19 oct no se perfora en espera de lodo. Se bombea cada 12 hrs para lubricar herramienta. El dia 20 oct a las 19 reinicia perforacion. Se observa represionamiento y caidas depresion en varias ocasiones y se levanta sarta. Se circula tiempo de atraso para estabilizar pozo. A las 23:00 del dia 20 oct se para perforaciopn por falta de lodo. Viaje a la zapata. Alas 17:00 del 21 oct se reasnuda perforacion. Se observan paros de la rotaria presumiblemente por derrumbe. El dia 28 oct se decide enviar bache de sosa caustica. Se informa a Supte. que este marterial esta fuera de especicicaciones para operar con esta herramienta. Ignora la recomendacion y se hace OOS report que no es firmado. Se hace viaaje de varias lingadas para acondicionar hoyo. Al intentar regresar a fondo se pego la tuberia. Despues de 76 martillazos y bombear un bache, la tuberia despego 3.5 horas mas tarde. La hertramienta aun funciona y decofica al 100%. Se hace viaje a la zapata, se intenta acondicionar hoyo pero no se logra regresar a fondo por alto torque al intentar tocar fondo. Una vez en superficie se observa que no viene la barrena ni la parte baja del autotrak (bit box). Se conecta herramienta para bajar memoria. OK
Details.Out_Of_Spec_Remark1: se decide enviar bache de sosa caustica. Se informa a Supte. que este marterial esta fuera de especicicaciones para operar con esta herramienta

Details.Remark: Begin:Nov 10 2013 1:30AM-End:Nov 13 2013 12:30AM Remark:Tool failed to pulse. Attempts at recycling pumps were futile as tool never pulsed back. Prior to tool failing a diagnostic downlink was sent which showed a failure of all ribs. Ten more feet were drilled without logging data at companies request. TD was called at 16668 feet TD.
Details.Out_Of_Spec_Remark1: Temperature - 330F Time vs Lateral - V2MAXXYM Level 5 = 5.0000 - 8.0000 = 1.28 Hours or 76.52 Minutes Level 6 = 8.0000 - 15.0000 = 3.95 Hours or 236.78 Minutes REALTIME Lateral Level 5 - 1.3 Lateral Level 6 - 4.9

Details.Remark: Begin:Jul 25 2013 8:50AM-End:Jul 26 2013 7:00PM Remark:1135 Rib one not tracking across the screen in ?stairstep? pattern and near bit inclination is dropping. Check diagnostics. 1144 Diagnostic downlink shows no pressure in ribs one or three. Rib two is 100psi less than the target. 1150 Call coordinator Shaun Viator about the tool failure. 1200 Monitor the continuing diagnostic measurements sent up from the tool. 1215 Pressure on rib two seems to be leaking off. Downlink to ribs off. 1221 After putting the tool into ribs off mode, we checked the diagnostics again. The pressure in rib two is gone. 1254 Survey at 12928 feet, before pulling out of the hole. 1315 Begin pulling out of hole. 1900 Tool above rotary. End INTEQ Run 10.

Begin:Jul 24 2013 1:15AM-End:Jul 25 2013 8:35AM Remark:Motor performed to specs. We experienced a pressure loss and after checking surface equipment the decision was made to POOH to check for wash outs.
Begin:Jul 22 2013 2:15AM-End:Jul 24 2013 12:30AM Remark:Tool performed to spec. Will rerun in Run 9. Change out bit
Begin:Jun 1 2013 7:30PM-End:Jun 4 2013 12:30PM Remark:End of INTEQ Run 5. Tool Performed to specification. Total Depth reached.

Begin:Apr 5 2013 8:00AM-End:Apr 9 2013 1:45AM Remark:Tools performed to specifications. During this run, the flow off pressures were not recorded during short trips between 04:00 to 06:00 hrs on 06 Apr; 21:15 hrs on 08 Apr to 02:00 hrs on 09 Apr.

Begin:Mar 29 2013 11:00PM-End:Apr 2 2013 1:15AM Remark:Tools performed to specifications. Tool rack back in derrick for LWD Run 3. Tool was flushed and filled with synthetic base oil and the GT steering unit protected and wrapped with trash bags.

Begin:Apr 16 2012 12:40AM-End:Apr 16 2012 2:00PM Remark:Tool quit pulsing after almost two hours of drilling. Brought strokes up to 96 (350 gpm 1400psi), still not pulsing. Surged the drill string a couple of times, pumped sweeps. Still not pulsing. Advised James and office of situation. Company man requested to pull out of hole and pick up back up tools before we had a chance to troubleshoot further.
Begin:Feb 6 2012 7:45AM-End:Feb 7 2012 10:17PM Remark:Rig drilled to well TD AT 9070 ft MD/ 3841 ft TVD. Tool performed to spec. 4.75" Tools will be sent back to the shop.

Begin:Dec 24 2011 1:45PM-End:Dec 26 2011 5:01PM Remark:We took a checkshot at 9707 ft MD. We had an inclination of 4.90 and an azimuth of 327. This gave us a dogleg of approximately 8 deg over a course of 60 feet. We recycled the pumps a couple of times to retake the survey and still got the same survey results. We brought this up to the company man (Rod Ellis). We pulled up to the depth of the previous survey (9672 feet) and took a checkshot at this depth to reconfirm the previous survey. For further reconfirmation, we pulled up to a random spot we had surveyed and took checkshot. 0855 Downlinked diagnostic survey. The results showed that the AutoTrak is in good condition. 0919 Check Shot at 9641 feet. Inc = 2.13, Azi = 144 0955 Downlink Steer Mode ? Steer Force = 100% and Steer Direction = 180. The DD called Geoff to inform him about the situation on location. He Job Number Operator Occidental of Elk Hills, MINWC.D Run 8 advised that we lower the ROP and try to steer the well. 1200 Tony Cheng came on location. He advised us to play with the drilling parameters and see if we could get the angle to drop. We reduced the RPM from 185 ? 100 and increased ROP to 20ft/hr. This did not work and the near bit inclination showed a build from 4.9 ? 5.1 degrees. With the fact that the result of the diagnostic from the AutoTrak shows the tool is working well, the only logical deductions was we are either in a fault or the bit is worn out and this is making the steering hard. 1250 The DD presented all the options to the company man regarding the situation. He was adamant that the steering head had failed regardless of the facts we had presented and he decided to pull out of the hole

Begin:Dec 23 2011 2:45PM-End:Dec 24 2011 1:45PM Remark:We POOH because we had a mismatch in the hydraulic program of the well. The Hydraulic program was designed based on a 8 3/4 bit and the required a high flow BCPM. We are using a 6 3/4 bit and require a normal flow BCPM. We attempted to go ahead and use the present configuration of HF Steering Head and BCPM but we could not due to the inability to pump at the required flow rate to power the tool with out maxing out the pump capacity.

Begin:Oct 2 2011 11:28AM-End:Oct 7 2011 1:00AM Remark:TOOLS PERFORMED TO SPECIFICATIONS FOR THIS RUN. TOOLS WILL BE LAID DOWN AND SHIPPED BACK TO THE SHOP FOR MAINT. AZITRAK SN# 11825063 WILL NEED THE DUMP HATCH LOOKED IN REGARDS TO THE INTERIOR THREADS. PLEASE SEE FRACAS FOR MORINFORMATION. Tools were stuck while pulling out of the hole and were freed after several days. Tools were jarred on an unknown amount of times and will need to be maintained accordingly.
Details.Out_Of_Spec_Remark1: Tools were stuck for several days while pulling out of the hole. Tools were also jarred on an unknown amount of times.

Details.Remark: Begin:Aug 9 2011 5:18PM-End:Aug 12 2011 1:35PM Remark:Tool performed to specifications. Pulling out of hole at well TD.

Begin:Mar 21 2011 11:00AM-End:Mar 26 2011 9:00PM Remark:BHA: Drill lateral with ATK - OnTrak. Drilled to TD of 14460'. ATK performed well. Wellbore controlled with left walk force up to 12% to 12906, then using right walk force to 50% build force at 12300 to maintain and build angle. ATK performed well. Laydown directional tools. RUN REPORT: Below rotary @ 11:00 Drilling ahead @ 20:00 hrs. Tools performing well. Port in junction box went down and we were down for 1:20 minutes troublshooting back up and running relogged fifteen feet of data and continued drilling ahead. Vibrations are low and autotrak is performing well. Ran a max of 23,000 WOB although estimates of on bottom weight were half that. After clarification with office over WOB paramiters we held ourselves to 300-350 Differential. Autotrak and Ontrak performed flawlessly and to spec. Vibrations were in spec and low with bit/tool combination. Bit came out looking green and was graded a 1/1
Begin:Dec 13 2010 12:30PM-End:Dec 16 2010 9:30PM Remark:Drilling lateral hole, Tool performing to specs. Very low ROP, decision was made to POOH and check the bit

Begin:Oct 22 2010 8:00AM-End:Oct 26 2010 12:15PM Remark:DD: DONALD HALE 7 TOBY SANDERS MWD: LUKE MOSES & JOHN ALMASI BHA RESULTS: NO PROBLEM DOWNLINKING OR HOLDLING INC. HOLDING AZ WELL STARTED WALKING HARD TO THE RIGHT (SOUTH) AT END OF RUN. -06% WF AND 30% BF WERE USED TO CONTROL AZ REASON FOR POOH: RELEASED

Begin:Oct 22 2010 8:00AM-End:Oct 22 2010 2:30PM Remark:DD: DONNY HALE & TOBY SANDERS MWD: LUKE MOSES & MYRA TREJO
TOOL DESYNCHED BEFORE GETTING TO BOTTOM. SURFACE TEST WAS GOOD. BIT STREAM OF ALL ZEROS WITH A TRAILING ONE. AFTER SEVERAL MINUTES BIT STREAM CHANGED TO ALL ONES. TALKED WITH ON CALL COORDINATOR AND TECH SUPPORT. THE ISSUE IS BELIEVED TO BE EITHER THE BCPM, ONTRAK OR THE STABALIZER BETWEEN THE TWO.

Se isntalo cabeza rotatoria. En 2 ocasiones hubo paro de operaciones debido a fugas en el Standpipe. Por mal tiempo tambien hubo paro de operaciones en varias ocasiones. El dia 17 opct a las 20:30 paro perforacion @ 3139 m por perdida. Envio comando ribsoff y saco a la zapata. Los dias 18 y 19 oct no se perfora en espera de lodo. Se bombea cada 12 hrs para lubricar herramienta. El dia 20 oct a las 19 reinicia perforacion. Se observa represionamiento y caidas depresion en varias ocasiones y se levanta sarta. Se circula tiempo de atraso para estabilizar pozo. A las 23:00 del dia 20 oct se para perforaciopn por falta de lodo. Viaje a la zapata. Alas 17:00 del 21 oct se reasnuda perforacion. Se observan paros de la rotaria presumiblemente por derrumbe. El dia 28 oct se decide enviar bache de sosa caustica. Se informa a Supte. que este marterial esta fuera de especicicaciones para operar con esta herramienta. Ignora la recomendacion y se hace OOS report que no es firmado. Se hace viaaje de varias lingadas para acondicionar hoyo. Al intentar regresar a fondo se pego la tuberia. Despues de 76 martillazos y bombear un bache, la tuberia despego 3.5 horas mas tarde. La hertramienta aun funciona y decofica al 100%. Se hace viaje a la zapata, se intenta acondicionar hoyo pero no se logra regresar a fondo por alto torque al intentar tocar fondo. Una vez en superficie se observa que no viene la barrena ni la parte baja del autotrak (bit box). Se conecta herramienta para bajar memoria. OK
Details.Out_Of_Spec_Remark1: se decide enviar bache de sosa caustica. Se informa a Supte. que este marterial esta fuera de especicicaciones para operar con esta herramienta

Details.Remark: Begin:Nov 10 2013 1:30AM-End:Nov 13 2013 12:30AM Remark:Tool failed to pulse. Attempts at recycling pumps were futile as tool never pulsed back. Prior to tool failing a diagnostic downlink was sent which showed a failure of all ribs. Ten more feet were drilled without logging data at companies request. TD was called at 16668 feet TD.
Details.Out_Of_Spec_Remark1: Temperature - 330F Time vs Lateral - V2MAXXYM Level 5 = 5.0000 - 8.0000 = 1.28 Hours or 76.52 Minutes Level 6 = 8.0000 - 15.0000 = 3.95 Hours or 236.78 Minutes REALTIME Lateral Level 5 - 1.3 Lateral Level 6 - 4.9

Details.Remark: Begin:Jul 25 2013 8:50AM-End:Jul 26 2013 7:00PM Remark:1135 Rib one not tracking across the screen in ?stairstep? pattern and near bit inclination is dropping. Check diagnostics. 1144 Diagnostic downlink shows no pressure in ribs one or three. Rib two is 100psi less than the target. 1150 Call coordinator Shaun Viator about the tool failure. 1200 Monitor the continuing diagnostic measurements sent up from the tool. 1215 Pressure on rib two seems to be leaking off. Downlink to ribs off. 1221 After putting the tool into ribs off mode, we checked the diagnostics again. The pressure in rib two is gone. 1254 Survey at 12928 feet, before pulling out of the hole. 1315 Begin pulling out of hole. 1900 Tool above rotary. End INTEQ Run 10.

Begin:Jul 24 2013 1:15AM-End:Jul 25 2013 8:35AM Remark:Motor performed to specs. We experienced a pressure loss and after checking surface equipment the decision was made to POOH to check for wash outs.
Begin:Jul 22 2013 2:15AM-End:Jul 24 2013 12:30AM Remark:Tool performed to spec. Will rerun in Run 9. Change out bit
Begin:Jun 1 2013 7:30PM-End:Jun 4 2013 12:30PM Remark:End of INTEQ Run 5. Tool Performed to specification. Total Depth reached.

Begin:Apr 5 2013 8:00AM-End:Apr 9 2013 1:45AM Remark:Tools performed to specifications. During this run, the flow off pressures were not recorded during short trips between 04:00 to 06:00 hrs on 06 Apr; 21:15 hrs on 08 Apr to 02:00 hrs on 09 Apr.

Begin:Mar 29 2013 11:00PM-End:Apr 2 2013 1:15AM Remark:Tools performed to specifications. Tool rack back in derrick for LWD Run 3. Tool was flushed and filled with synthetic base oil and the GT steering unit protected and wrapped with trash bags.

Report.Name: Run History Data for PN - SN

Details.Remark: Begin:Oct 16 2015 11:00AM-End:Oct 30 2015 11:58AM Remark:Durante el armado de BHA hubo problemas de comunicación con el ATK. Del troubleshooting se encontro el stab modular en cortocircuito. Se reemplazo y continuo armando. La prueba con flujo se hizo a 300m porque en superficie se desbordo la presa. Se isntalo cabeza rotatoria. En 2 ocasiones hubo paro de operaciones debido a fugas en el Standpipe. Por mal tiempo tambien hubo paro de operaciones en varias ocasiones. El dia 17 opct a las 20:30 paro perforacion @ 3139 m por perdida. Envio comando ribsoff y saco a la zapata. Los dias 18 y 19 oct no se perfora en espera de lodo. Se bombea cada 12 hrs para lubricar herramienta. El dia 20 oct a las 19 reinicia perforacion. Se observa represionamiento y caidas depresion en varias ocasiones y se levanta sarta. Se circula tiempo de atraso para estabilizar pozo. A las 23:00 del dia 20 oct se para perforaciopn por falta de lodo. Viaje a la zapata. Alas 17:00 del 21 oct se reasnuda perforacion. Se observan paros de la rotaria presumiblemente por derrumbe. El dia 28 oct se decide enviar bache de sosa caustica. Se informa a Supte. que este marterial esta fuera de especicicaciones para operar con esta herramienta. Ignora la recomendacion y se hace OOS report que no es firmado. Se hace viaaje de varias lingadas para acondicionar hoyo. Al intentar regresar a fondo se pego la tuberia. Despues de 76 martillazos y bombear un bache, la tuberia despego 3.5 horas mas tarde. La hertramienta aun funciona y decofica al 100%. Se hace viaje a la zapata, se intenta acondicionar hoyo pero no se logra regresar a fondo por alto torque al intentar tocar fondo. Una vez en superficie se observa que no viene la barrena ni la parte baja del autotrak (bit box). Se conecta herramienta para bajar memoria. OK
Details.Out_Of_Spec_Remark1: se decide enviar bache de sosa caustica. Se informa a Supte. que este marterial esta fuera de especicicaciones para operar con esta herramienta
